Key Arguments: The legislation threatens to remove the rights of individuals to reason, deduce, and communicate freely.
The proposed powers could turn a free society into a dictatorship where citizens must adhere to government dictates.
The real threat is the legislation itself, not misinformation or disinformation.
Notable Quotes: This proposed legislation threatens to remove these rights, and will turn our free, diverse society into a dictatorship in which every citizen must believe whatever the government dictates, under threat of punishment.

No, it is not misinformation and disinformation that are the threat! Legislation such as this is the threat, the lion waiting to pounce, to shred and devour the victim, which is our right to free speech and a free society.
